properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Mimi ni mzabibu,
mimi ni mzabibu
nanyi ni matawi yangu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kaeni ndani yangu,
nami ndani yenu—
Kwani mu matawi
nami kweli ni mzabibu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nje yangu mimi
hamuwezi kuzaa —
Kwani mu matawi
nami kweli ni mzabibu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tawi lizaalo,
lizidi kuzaa i—
Kwani mu matawi
nami kweli ni mzabibu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Furaha yangu iwe,
ndani yenu —
Kwani mu matawi
nami kweli ni mzabibu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ombeni lolote,
nanyi mtapewai—
Kwani mu matawi
nami kweli ni mzabibu.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Amri yangu ndiyo,
mpate kupendana —
Kwani mu matawi
nami kweli ni mzabibu.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Niliwachagua,
muwe rafiki zangu —
Kwani mu matawi
nami kweli ni mzabibu.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Zaeni matunda,
yapate kukaai—
Kwani mu matawi
nami kweli ni mzabibu.
